edge_1: Mia Grey, the adoptive daughter of Carrick Grey and Dr. Grace Trevelyan Grey, and younger sister of Christian and Elliot Grey, played by Rita Ora in the movie. Mia's friend José Rodriguez is portrayed by Victor Rasuk.
edge_2: José Rodriguez, one of Anastasia's friends, portrayed by Victor Rasuk in the movie. Dakota Johnson depicts Ana, who has José as her friend.
edge_3: Katherine Kavanagh, Ana's best friend and Elliot Grey's fiancée, portrayed by Eloise Mumford in the movie. Dakota Johnson plays the character of Ana, who is Katherine's friend.
